DIRECT ENTRY  
ABU accepts'A’ level/IJMB passes in Arabic/ Islamic 
Studies and any other relevant subject.  
GSU accepts combined Diploma in Hausa, Arabic and 
Islamic Studies.  
EDZAR requires three (3) NCE/'A' level passes 
including Islamic Studies. Admission is by Direct Entry 
only.   
Also requires credit passes in English Language and 
four (4) other subjects which should include Islamic 
studies and a credit pass in Mathematics.   
Accepts NCE in Islamic Studies combination with any 
other subject with ‘C' grade including Education.  
UMYUK accepts NCE credit in the subject of 
specialization and/or any other subject.  
TASUED accepts two (2) 'A' level passes/NCE merit in

subjects.
